message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a deal, but this product truly is exceptional.  $950,000 is my best offer at this time. I'm confident you won't find this kind of value elsewhere.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think it's a reasonable price considering the value you've placed on it.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's find a middle ground.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product.

I understand that you're willing to come down to $900,000, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.
